channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘They took all of our oil not that long ago. And we want it back’: Trump demands Venezuela return seized assets
item.description: U.S. oil companies dominated Venezuela's petroleum industry until the the 1970s and then under Nicolás Maduro and his predecessor, Hugo Chávez.

item.title: PayPal CEO Alex Chriss says stablecoins will be key as his company navigates the ‘classic innovator’s dilemma’
item.description: The nearly-three-decade-old firm is incorporating dollar-backed tokens across its business verticals, say PayPal executives.

item.title: Mamdani Names Budget Director as He Prepares to Enact Costly Agenda

item.title: State Department announces massive $10 billion arms sale to Taiwan, infuriating China
item.description: China said it would violate diplomatic agreements, gravely harm China's sovereignty, security and territorial integrity, and undermine regional stabil...

item.title: 25 years after a Harvard professor told America it was ‘bowling alone,’ the loneliness epidemic is starker than ever
item.description: In 2023, then Surgeon General Vivek Murthy reported on an “epidemic of loneliness and isolation,” similar to previous advisories on smoking and obesit...

item.title: Interest Rate Cut and Slower Inflation Offer Britons a Reprieve

item.title: Top AI defense CEO warns China could ‘bleed American stockpiles dry’ in the event of a conflict, claiming U.S. munitions could run out in a week
item.description: U.S. weapons systems are also likely difficult to mobilize in case of a conflict.

item.title: Youngest Victim of Bondi Beach Shooting Laid to Rest
item.description: A funeral was held on Thursday for Matilda, 10, the youngest victim of Sunday’s mass shooting at Bondi Beach.

item.title: European Leaders Discuss Financing Ukraine With Frozen Russian Assets
item.description: The European Council convened in Brussels to discuss leveraging up to $247 billion in frozen Russian government assets held in Europe to finance Ukrai...

item.title: Palo Alto Confronts Billionaires Over Their Housing Compounds
item.description: The Silicon Valley college town has changed drastically as Mark Zuckerberg, Larry Page and other tech founders have scooped up multiple properties.

item.title: Australia Mourns the Youngest Victim of the Bondi Beach Shooting
item.description: Sydney’s devastated Jewish community gathered for the funeral of “Matilda Bee,” an ebullient, smiling 10-year-old girl.
